questions.question: Considering the overall visual presentation, what is the predominant color of the visible trim bordering each individual bag?

What shape most accurately describes the form of each individual bag when flattened?
Considering the visual details, are there any noticeable fasteners or closure mechanisms on the bags?
What is the main color of the bags, disregarding any trim or markings?

Based on the visual texture, what is the perceived quality of the bag material?
Focusing on the edges, what is the visual appearance of the seams or joins in the bags?
